/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a palette of mostly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and green accents. 

Parked cars line the sides of the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the clear blue sky. Trees dot the landscape, their leaves a vibrant green, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light.
